content:
@Deepak Cherian, Martin from anacondainc and I recently co-hosted an introductory xarray tutorial (the first of a few)

The tutorial materials and the tutorial recording are available on GitHub & Youtube respectively and you can run through them any time or share them with others.

GitHub repo: https://github.com/xarray-contrib/xarray-tutorial

and here's the recording URL
https://youtu.be/a339Q5F48UQ
